it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.iteractions

Interface InteractionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomsContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InteractionStackImpl, MockInteractionContext

    public interface InteractionContext
extends AtomsContainer
    Everything an Interaction is allowed to ask of the context it is created with. This may be passed on to other Interactions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Player> getDamagedPlayers()
      Retrieve a list of all the Players that have been damaged as a result of the application of this context's effect.
      AtomEffectContext getEffectContext()
      Retrieve the EffectContext for the effects applied by the requesting interaction
      Player getVictim()
      Retrieves the singular victim protagonist of this effect, if present.
      void pushInteraction(Interaction interaction)
      Add an Interaction to this context's stack.
      void setVictim(Player victim)
      Assigns this context's victim for future use by other Interactions

      • Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.AtomsContainer

        getActor, getDataSource, getGame
